title: Changing places: a social studies resource
creator_credit: Dave Gibson, New Zealand National Film Unit and Gibson Film Productions
brief_description: A series of vignettes which show the contrasts that exist between groups within a modern industrial society - between the rich and poor, the free and the imprisoned, etc.
